name: Zalando SE
goal: Zalando (https://corporate.zalando.com) is Europe’s leading online platform for fashion and lifestyle. Founded in Berlin in 2008, we bring head-to-toe fashion to more than 29 million active customers in 17 European markets, offering clothing, footwear, accessories and beauty. The assortment of over 2,000 international brands ranges from world famous names to local labels. Our platform is a one-stop fashion destination for inspiration, innovation, and interaction. In the third quarter of 2019, around 70% of orders came from mobile devices. As Europe’s most fashionable tech company, we work hard to find digital solutions for every aspect of the fashion journey: for our customers, partners and every valuable player in the Zalando story. Zalando counts around 14,000 employees from 130 different nationalities.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Environment, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
